sub_title: Experienced professional in Study & Career Guidance - (Motor)profiling talent & careerpotential - school-study-work-(elite) sport - Translating science in (Eu)regional and (inter)national collaborative projects
summary:
Next level HRM and professional study- & career guidance

I am
a performance profiler, behavioural analyst, trainer, coach, guide, teacher, counsellor, advisor, consultant.

As an applied scientist in the domain of career guidance I like to focus on:

1. human performance, flow, complexity, finding your element, psychodiagnostics, motricity and motor signatures, biomechanics, neuro- and brain models, behavioural profiles, skills and talent, individual learning strategies, learning preferences, learning abilities, personality traits, self-knowledge, self-awareness, self-esteem and self-regulation (guiding people)

2. educational designs especially how to build regenerative learning ecologies, working in international environments and cross-border collaborations

Profiling
Biomechanical (physical) or motorprofiling and conventional psychodiagnostic (verbal) profiling. 'Motivation' for example is tested and determined in a physical (!) testprotocol. Really? Yes, really! I am licensed to work with professional psychometrics. 

This is reliable, straightforward feedback and ... the future!

Profiling and guiding who?
Youngsters in school and study, adults in or out of a job, talented people, student-athletes in dual careers, elite athletes with a need to feel comfortable in uncomfortable situations, students who seek a matching study abroad, TEAMS...

Why?
It upgrades personal performance, strenghtens confidence and enhances your selfregulation skills

Working in education
As an experienced expert I work with pupils and students. They inspire me, I inspire them on their journey.

Working in the sports industry
I profile and train athletes, trainers, coaches physically! and mentally. I help them to understand why they are unique in what they do IN ACTION and how to upgrade their performance. I help talented student-athletes find balance in dealing with their dual career struggles.

My base
The south of the Netherlands. A Euregion close to Belgium and Germany.

Learning courses
I offer full service very personal, very practical learning courses with possibility to stay overnight in the hotel! Courses are either half (5 hours) - or full day courses (10 hours) - One and half day or two day courses are options as well.

ActionTypes.com Approach
The approach starts with researching and validating physical preferences, your natural way of moving, which leads to a very solid personal career profiles. Yes, profiles. You are never one type! Read about Body-Brain-Behaviour (in Dutch) on https://paulsmitconsultancy.nl/werkwijze-bbb-

Interested?

I gave them lectures and two masterclasses / workshops on movement and braintyping. Every athlete has preferences in his/her movement. What can we learn from the team? Can we improve coaching? What can the players learn from it? How do we maximize our strengths in these two games? What doe we learn if we look at the preferences of our opponents?

projects.title: Pilot Project 'transition improvements leaving highschool and entering higher education'
projects.description: In a joint effort working together with universities of applied sciences Fontys Hogescholen and Zuyd Hogeschool we focus on student drop out reduction. In highschool our students worked in their personal career portfolio’s for several years. Before entering higher education these portfolio's will give great insight in the candidates competences, aptitudes, personality markers, learning strategy, motivational drivers, experiences and ambitions. Why not ask for them? Together with so called 'Student Plus Documents, rewards and achievements, work experiences, diploma's a personal career portfolio will smoothen the transition into higher education. After 2020 we have to work on support from our politicians, board members, education managers to finance this process better so that we can improve facilities.

projects.title: Dual Career Coaching in Topsport - Duale Loopbaanbegeleiding Onderwijs en Topsport
projects.description:
Paul Smit is (sport)agoog en sinds 1996 geregistreerd studie- en loopbaanadviseur. Hij is werkzaam voor topsporttalentschool Trevianum Sittard en gespecialiseerd in het samenstellen van studiebegeleidingsprogramma’s voor talenten, bijvoorbeeld topsporters. Om inzicht te krijgen in en het ontwikkelen van typische voorkeuren bij het identificeren van talent en de persoonlijke leerstrategie maakt hij gebruik van testmethodiek. Eén van deze methodes is de typeleer, in bijzonder de 'Action Type Benadering'. Een deel uit het gesprek met hem over zijn aanpak en visie.

“In het onderwijs maar ook daarvoor toen ik nog werkzaam was als HR-consultant, miste ik inzichten in de relatie tussen het fysieke gedrag (de motorische voorkeuren) en de mentale eigenschappen van de mens. Mijns inziens noodzakelijke informatie binnen coachtrajecten.” Voor Paul is de Zwitser Bertrand Théraulaz, die in de jaren tachtig met Ralph Hippolyte startte met de zoektocht naar de achtergronden van de individuele verschillen in motoriek voorkeur, een inspirator geweest. “Ik heb meerdere leergangen rondom Action Type gevolgd.

“Een deel van de jongeren die ik als loopbaanadviseur begeleid is ook topsporter. Je kunt je voorstellen dat het voor zowel de sporter als zijn trainer prettig is om over specifieke informatie te beschikken. Dat kan heel specifiek door videobeelden van trainingen en wedstrijden te analyseren en een beeld te krijgen van hoe de sporter denkt en handelt, dus welke acties hij bij voorkeur maakt en wat zijn motieven zijn.” Volgens Smit is de opbrengst hiervan: persoonlijke aandacht, minder blessures, heldere communicatie, meer zelfvertrouwen, beter begrip van tactiek en bevordering van samenwerking met staf en teamgenoten.

Voor meer informatie over deze loopbaanbegeleiding kan contact worden opgenomen met Paul Smit: paulsmitlob@hotmail.com. Hij is op afspraak werkzaam op de vestiging in Geleen (Norbertijnenstraat 77a) van Medi-Sport.

projects.title: Educatieve Agenda Limburg (Educational Agenda Limburg Netherlands)
projects.description:
Limburg Educational Agenda

Good education is, obviously, of crucial importance for the development of wellbeing. A programme to streamline education, the Limburg Educational Agenda is a joint initiative by Maastricht University, Zuyd University of Applied Sciences, Fontys and numerous school boards in primary, secondary and vocational education. It aim is to reduce mismatches in the choice of study programme and profession, increase the quality of teacher training, attract motivated students, decrease the gap between educational science and practice, and optimise the effectiveness of educational improvements. 

http://www.maastrichtuniversity.nl/web/file?uuid=d3d1c423-9b5a-470e-803b-846151a3f814&owner=7c57fe9d-5bf6-4f6f-b83d-d6535e1832ee

projects.title: Supporting Erasmus+ projects concerning Education - Career (Talent) Development - and Dual Career Coaching
projects.description:
I attented several meetings where topics in dual career management and - coaching for young athletes where highlighted. They are in my line of expertise. In the future I will show more active involvement. For now we work on quality content for our guidanceprograms.

From the Erasmus+ webpage: 
Actions in the field of sport are designed to promote participation in sport, physical activity, and voluntary activities. They are also designed to tackle threats to the integrity of sport, promote dual careers for athletes, improve good governance, and foster tolerance and social inclusion, as well as contribute to the implementation of the European Week of Sport.

projects.title: Oriëntatie op Vervolg Onderwijs (OVO) - Aansluiting VO-HO in provincies Limburg en Brabant
projects.description:
Transition guidance between secondary education and higher education.

Oriëntatie op Vervolg Onderwijs (OVO) is in eerste instantie een werk- informatiegroep die uit vertegenwoordigers bestaat van Maastricht University, TE Eindhoven, Tilburg University, Fontys HS, Zuyd HS en loopbaanbegeleiders en counselors uit HAVO/VWO Limburg. In een aantal jaarlijkse meetings bespreken we relevante onderwijsthema's en proberen we de aansluiting tussen VO en HO te verbeteren. Tevens organiseren we één maal per jaar een symposium. Zie Project URL. Daarnaast onderhoudt OVO contacten met de Provincie, VO-HO en de VO-Raad.

projects.title: PSV Football Eindhoven talentanalysis youthteams - how to reduce dropout rates.
projects.description: Working with psychodiagnostics in education has a two main goals. The preventive goal is to support and strenghten self-awareness respectively self-understanding which is needed to make better choices (in a topsportcareer but also in life). The curative goal is to explane better why choices didn't turn out well. PSV was interested in the professional psychodiagnostic instruments (tests, questionaires, type-indicators) we use to guide students with a topsportstatus and how they could apply this in the football academy.

courses.name: 2011 - 2012 Trainer Coach UEFA - 3 YOUTH (football). Teachers John Ortmans and Maurice Voestermans

2011 JTI-MBTI. I am licensed to facilitate the Jung Type Index instrument having been trained by Teachers Dick Otter (Lefconsult) and Rianne van Strien (Coach2score). The Jungian Type Index JTI is an alternative to the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator® (MBTI).
2012 Masterclass Type & Motor behaviour - Action Type. Teachers Dick Otter (Lefconsult) and Rianne van Strien (Coach2Score)
2013 Action Type. I am trained in how to use the Action Type theory in practice. My teachers at the Action Type Academy where Peter Murphy and Bennie Douwes

2013 Golden Personality Type Profiler. I am licensed to facilitate the Golden Type Profiler having been trained by Pearson Assessment Netherlands. Teacher Hiltje Karenbeld. This instrument adds a 5th dimension Tense - Calm to the Jung Type Profile
2014 REISS Profile:I am certified to facilitate the Reiss Motivation Profile® having been trained by teachers Wim Olbrechts, Karin Terpstra and John Delnoy.
2015 Action Types Approach Practioner Basic Course: in depth module. Trained by Bertrand Théraulaz. How to bring people, particularly talented athletes, to a higher level.

2015 Deep Motivational Drivers  - Action Type Academy - Adding depth to the Action Type model through researching individual motives that drives people, particularly elite athletes and young high potentials to a higher, succesfull level.
2017-2018 Action Types Certification Course Paris - Amsterdam Trained by Bertrand Théraulaz

profile_positions.title: Career counsellor / Dual career guidance athletes / Coordinator / Behavioural analyst / Talent coach

profile_positions.description: Individual and very personal Study- (Dual) Career guidance learning courses full service plus pre- and post interventions. Services can include overnight stay at a Hotel. You are the center of attention starting with profiling you biomechanically. It gives you clear and strong insights in your typology/personality, motivation, learning strategy, competences and more. But most important you will learn how to train and coach yourself in choosing suitable steppingstones in your study- and careerpath OR in high performance environments like elite sports and business.
profile_positions.title: (International) Study-& Careerguidance -based on psychometric motorprofiles-

company.name: Expertisepunt LOB I Initiatief van de VO-raad, MBO Raad en Vereniging Hogescholen

profile_positions.company: Expertisepunt LOB I Initiatief van de VO-raad, MBO Raad en Vereniging Hogescholen
profile_positions.description:
Samen aan de slag met LOB. 
Het Expertisepunt LOB ondersteunt vo-, mbo-, en hbo-scholen bij het versterken van de loopbaan- oriëntatie en -(studie) begeleiding van jongeren.

Wij informeren, organiseren en faciliteren. Alle informatie over LOB/SLB is op onze website te vinden en we organiseren zowel landelijk als regionaal kennisdelingsbijeenkomsten. Daarnaast kunnen scholen bij het Expertisepunt terecht met vragen over de implementatie van LOB/SLB, de kwaliteitsborging, professionalisering en over LOB op de overgangen (vo-mbo-hbo).

volunteer_experiences.description:
With a group of 35 students and a staff of six we went to help out on different schoolprojects in Thailand and Cambodia. I will name a few: 
SOID Siem Reap Cambodia www.soidngo.org, www.cchcambodia.org and Cambodia Light Children's Orphanage at phnom penh. 

We fixed all kind of problems, bought beds, cookingstoves, made outer schoolwalls and a garden attractive, fixed ceilings and installed coolingfans in classrooms, bought food and shoes and gave classroomlessons about healthcare and hygiene, installed a bookbuddy, taught sports and dance and a few words of English.
